reviewText: I LOVED the animation. It's the 1st time I ever seen animation like it & I think it looked pretty cool. OK, That's the best & only good thing I can say about the movie. Other than that, Top Cat SUCKED!!! I tried watching the entire movie (Probably because I enjoyed the animation so much) but I just could NOT do it. Top Cat is a movie I don't think kids would even be able to sit through. The storyline & jokes were just straight up BORING, CORNY & LAME..I enjoyed the original Top Cat cartoons so I was hoping to enjoy this movie but I didn't at all. It might be worth watching for a couple minutes just to check out the animation but that's about it
This was better than a lot of the remakes today

This might be the WORST Animated movie ever made! (and I have seen FOOD FIGHT!) Maybe not the most unpleasant, (which is why I'm giving it two stars instead of one) but I DO NOT recommend this one to fans of animation, or even fans of the show!

The only positive thing I can say, is that they at least had the decency to offer a download of the movie for FREE with purchase of the DVD. But other than that, this one is a DEFINITE SKIP!
Because after seeing the trailers on youtube, I was waiting for the movie to come to the United States. When I saw that you had it on dvd I decided to order it.
It's a great movie that brings back childhood memories at a really good price. Love being able to share it with my kids now as well!
For starter, my 9 year son saw a preview of this movie and he told me about it. So I decided to purchase it, since couldn't find it at the store.

Yeah this is not a masterpiece by any means, but it does what it is supposed to do: put T.C. and his friends in a modern day adventure. It's effectual and purr-fect in every which way. Highly Recommended!
I haven't really watched it however my one year old doesn't seem to like it like he does his other cartoons so i will watch it and tell u later what I think
She  has seen it but didn't say anything to me.  I think she liked  it too!  Thank you!
Certainly not the 1960s series but an enjoyable family movie.
got as gift,so far no complaints.
Love Top Cat was very happy to see this

I was pleasantly surprised by my sons interest in this movie. It's usually his choice to watch before dozens of others he has. He tells everyone how great this movie is to him and even takes it along when we go places. It's not only one character but  all of them he likes.
I forgot how violent this was and my 4 year old grandson and 5 year old granddaughter did not find it entertaining after about 15 minutes
not sure why but my 5 year old absolutely love this movie and can watch it over and over.
